email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Liam,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 75,000 MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel candidate and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thanks for reaching out. We have the vessel OCEAN HARMONY available for your route. The freight quote is USD 25/MT. The vessel has a DWT of 82,000 and an LOA of 225m. Laycan dates are 25-30 Sep. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Liam Johnson

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Liam,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 25/MT seems a bit high. Could you provide more details on the demurrage rate and any possible adjustments to the freight quote?

Looking forward to your response.
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Additional Details
email_chain.body:
Emily,

The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day. Considering your concerns, we can revise the freight quote to USD 23/MT. Does this meet your requirements?

Best regards,
Liam Johnson

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Final Offer
email_chain.body:
Liam,

USD 23/MT is acceptable. Please confirm the details and let's proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Emily Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Thank you for your confirmation. The booking is now fixed. I will send you the contract shortly.

Best regards,
Liam Johnson
